get.summary: BlockTip queries current the latest confirmed bitcoin height by relayer
DepositAddress queries current address for deposit

public_key.title: PublicKey defines the keys available for use with relayer

schema.title:
QueryDepositAddressResponse is response type for the Query/DepositAddress RPC
method

parameters.name: evm_address
parameters.description: evm_address is an eth address to deposit

get.summary: HasDeposited checks if a deposit transaction is confirmed on chain
Params queries the parameters of the module.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

confirmation_number.title:
A block has the confirmation number should be considered as a finalized
block, and it's very hard to be rollbacked Using 6 is recommended for the
bitcoin mainnet and you can use 1 on the regtest/devnet

schema.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

get.summary: Pubkeys queries current public key for deposit

public_key.title: PublicKey defines the keys available for use with relayer

schema.title: QueryPubkeyResponse is response type for the Query/Pubkey RPC method

get.summary: Withdrawal queries the withdrawal status and receipt

status.description:
WithdrawalStatus is the status of a withdrawal.

 - WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED defines an invalid status.
 - WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_PENDING: WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_PENDING
 - WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_PROCESSING: WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_PROCESSING
 - WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_CANCELING: WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_CANCELING
 - WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_CANCELED: WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_CANCELED
 - WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_PAID: WITHDRAWAL_STATUS_PAID

schema.description: QueryEthBlockResponse is response type for the Query/EthBlock RPC method.

get.summary: Parameters queries the parameters of the module.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

accept_proposer_timeout.title: accept_proposer_timeout, set it to zero to skip the check

schema.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

get.summary: Pubkeys queries all current public keys

items.title: PublicKey defines the keys available for use with relayer

schema.title: QueryPubkeysResponse is response type for the Query/Pubkeys RPC method

epoch.title: the epoch number, increasing every election

proposer_accepted.title: proposer_accepted defined proposer has accepted the election result

relayer.title: Relayer represents the current relayer group state

schema.title: QueryRelayerResponse is response type for the Query/Voters RPC method

get.summary:
Voters queries a voter details by it's address
the address can be bech32 or eth format

vote_key.title:
vote key is the bls12-381 G2 compressed pubkey(96 bytes)
the key is a sha256 hash if the voter is pending to join the relayer
network

status.title: status represents the current voter status
status.description:
VoterStatus is the status of a voter.

 - VOTER_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: VOTER_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED defines an invalid status.
 - VOTER_STATUS_PENDING: VOTER_STATUS_PENDING defines a pending voter which was added on the chain
he still needs to send online proof to proposer to prove liveness and
ownership of the public key
 - VOTER_STATUS_ON_BOARDING: VOTER_STATUS_ON_BOARDING defines a voter that is approved from current
proposer the voter will be added to voter list in the next election
 - VOTER_STATUS_OFF_BOARDING: VOTER_STATUS_OFF_BOARDING defines a voter that is removing from relayer
group the voter will be removed from **chain state db** in the next
election
 - VOTER_STATUS_ACTIVATED: VOTER_STATUS_ACTIVATED defines a voter that is working.

height.title:
height represents the block number of conensus layer when voter is approved
to join on execution layer

schema.title: QueryVotersRequest is response type for the Query/Voters RPC method

get.summary: Parameters queries the parameters of the module.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

exiting_duration.title:
if the token amount is less then threshold, the validator will be the
inactive status the validator operator should wait for long then paritial
unlock duation

max_validators.description: max_validators is the maximum number of validators.

schema.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

get.summary: Validator queries validator state by address.

items.description:
Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.

status.description:
ValidatorStatus is the status of a validator.

 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: UNSPECIFIED defines an invalid validator status.
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_PENDING: Pending means the validator is waitting for
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_ACTIVE: Active means the validator is producing and voting new blocks
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_TOMBSTONED: Tombstoned means the validator did malicious behaviors like double sign and
killed out
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_DOWNGRADE: Downgrade means the validator is offline
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_INACTIVE: Inactive means the validator is exiting in progress or exited

offset.title: offset of the current sign window

missed.title: missed of the current sign window

jailed_until.description: Timestamp until which the validator is jailed due to liveness downtime.

confirmation_number.title:
A block has the confirmation number should be considered as a finalized
block, and it's very hard to be rollbacked Using 6 is recommended for the
bitcoin mainnet and you can use 1 on the regtest/devnet

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description:
Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.

exiting_duration.title:
if the token amount is less then threshold, the validator will be the
inactive status the validator operator should wait for long then paritial
unlock duation

max_validators.description: max_validators is the maximum number of validators.

status.description:
ValidatorStatus is the status of a validator.

 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: UNSPECIFIED defines an invalid validator status.
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_PENDING: Pending means the validator is waitting for
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_ACTIVE: Active means the validator is producing and voting new blocks
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_TOMBSTONED: Tombstoned means the validator did malicious behaviors like double sign and
killed out
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_DOWNGRADE: Downgrade means the validator is offline
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_INACTIVE: Inactive means the validator is exiting in progress or exited

goat.locking.v1.ValidatorStatus.description:
ValidatorStatus is the status of a validator.

 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: UNSPECIFIED defines an invalid validator status.
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_PENDING: Pending means the validator is waitting for
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_ACTIVE: Active means the validator is producing and voting new blocks
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_TOMBSTONED: Tombstoned means the validator did malicious behaviors like double sign and
killed out
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_DOWNGRADE: Downgrade means the validator is offline
 - VALIDATOR_STATUS_INACTIVE: Inactive means the validator is exiting in progress or exited
